parameters.query: =INSERT INTO ucproxy_accounts (account_id, device_id, realm, sip_username, sip_password, type, added_timestamp) VALUES ('{{$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["account_id"]}}', '{{$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["id"]}}', '{{$node["Account Details"].json["data"]["realm"]}}', '{{$node["Device Details"].json["data"]["sip"]["username"]}}','{{$node["Device Details"].json["data"]["sip"]["password"]}}', '{{$node["Device Details"].json["data"]["device_type"]}}',NOW())

parameters.subject: OneUC LinkUp Desktop is Ready!
parameters.html:
= EmailTemplate-Fluid
Your new OneUC LinkUp Softphone is Ready!
 

Congrats!

The very coolest communications thingie has been setup for your use. Of course we are talking about OneUC LinkUp, the super amazing application which turns your Windows PC or Apple Mac into a simple yet sophisticated phone system. In just moments you will be able to take advantage of some great features and options while experiencing high quality HD-Level calling.

There are just a few simple steps you will need to complete in order to get setup.

Step 1:

You will need to download the OneUC LinkUp app and install it on your computer. Below are links to the Windows/PC and Apple Mac version of the app. Simply download it and install it like you would any other application.

Download OneUC LinkUp

for Windows

Download OneUC LinkUp

for Apple Mac

 

Step 2:

After downloading the OneUC LinkUp App, click on the "Set Me Up" Button below, and like Magic everything will automatically be setup for you. 

The OneUC LinkUp App will automatically start, download it's updates and configure itself. There is nothing else you need to do.  

Please note that you can only press the setup button once. If you try to press it more than one time you will get a message that your instance is already being used by another computer, womp womp.

If you run into any issues, feel free to call toll free at +1.833.464.4111 or email support@oneuc.com, and one of our helpful support experts will be more than happy to assist you.

Don't forget to INSTALL the Software first, then press the "Set Me Up" Button

Set me Up!

parameters.subject: OneUC LinkUp Mobile is Ready!
parameters.text:
Your new OneUC LinkUp Softphone is Ready!
 

Congrats!

Someone really likes you because they have enabled an instance of the best mobile softphone on the market. Yep, that's right, OneUC LinkUp Mobile Edition has been provisioned for your use. In just moments we are going to turn your Apple or Andriod based Mobile Device into a simple yet sophisticated phone system. In just moments you will be able to take advantage of some great features and options while experiencing high quality HD-Level calling.

There are just a few simple steps you will need to complete in order to get setup.

Step 1:

You will need to download the OneUC LinkUp Mobile app and install it on your phone. You can do this by going to the Apple App Store, or Google Play Store and searching for OneUC Linkup.

Or if you would like, you can click on the link below from your mobile phone.

 

Step 2:

After downloading the OneUC LinkUp App to your mobile phone, you will need to launch the app, and then scan the QR code below. This will automatically kick off the provisioning. If you are unable to scan the QR code Please enter the following details into the app at the login screen:, click on the "Set Me Up" Button below, and like Magic everything will automatically be setup for you. 

The OneUC LinkUp App will automatically start, download it's updates and configure itself. There is nothing else you need to do.  

Username: {{$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["id"]}}
Password: {{$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["account_id"]}}

 

If you run into any issues, feel free to call toll free at +1.833.464.4111 or email support@oneuc.com, and one of our helpful support experts will be more than happy to assist you.

Don't forget Scan the QR Code Below!
